DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prospectively determine side effect profile adult neuropathic pain receive intravenous infusion lidocaine 5 mg per kg lean body weight , infuse 45 minute .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility Criteria : Adults > 18 yr chronic central peripheral neuropathic pain St Joseph 's Health Care Pain Clinic June December 2009 . Outcome measure : All side effect spontaneously report . Sedation , nausea , dizziness Visual Analog Score Q 15 minute ; hemodynamic data q 5 minute infusion 30 minute . Daily diary side effect Visual Analogue score Pain 7 day post-infusion .
